name: DT Directory Lite Addon
author: the DesignThemes team

sections.description:
Do you want to add advanced listing features to your existing website?

Are you searching for a free Directory WordPress plugin that’s comprehensive yet easy to use?

Then get this powerful free WordPress Directory Plugin that can give you all the essential functionalities you need for your directory business website. Try DT Directory Lite now!

This free Directory WordPress plugin can work well for all online directories, listings, and classified ad websites.

DT Directory WordPress Plugin Pro | Documentation | Support

DT Directory Lite is a free yet comprehensive Business Directory Plugin that offers you the easiest way to create online directory websites. This versatile plugin can help you create online business directory websites or free online business listing sites for any niche. You can use it to add job listings, real estate listings, employee directories, company directories, service directories, classified ads, hotel classifieds, and other business listings.

WORDPRESS DIRECTORY LISTING PLUGIN FOR FEATURE-PACKED BUSINESS LISTING WEBSITES

Turn your WordPress site into an online business listings directory such a Tripadvisor, Yelp, and Yellow Pages. DT Directory Lite addon makes it super easy. This WordPress Business Listing Plugin offers a simple and intuitive way for creating feature-packed business directories or classified websites on WordPress.

DT Directory Lite is a powerful and highly optimized business directory plugin capable of supporting an unlimited number of listings. It offers you an intuitive and dynamic process for managing your online directory business. Using this best directory plugin, you can easily add search forms, customizable map listings, packages, and other valuable features to your listing websites.

DT Directory Lite provides you with all the features you need for creating a new and used car selling directory, staff directory, team directory, booking directory, real estate directory, job portal, medical directory, doctor directory, address book, and other similar listing websites.

If you are searching for a free and simple directory plugin for WordPress, DT Directory Lite is the best option for you.

Get this WordPress Directory Plugin free to create a feature-packed online directory website. DT Directory Lite is here to provide you all the features you need!

ADVANTAGES OF DT DIRECTORY WORDPRESS PLUGIN:

Powerful free WordPress Directory Plugin that works with all themes.

This free Directory plugin can work with all WP themes that are compatible with the latest WordPress versions. You can install DT Directory like any other plugin and turn your website into a directory, listing, or classified ads website.

DT Directory Lite is a free Directory WordPress plugin and always will be!

All the advanced functionalities of this powerful directory plugin are available to you for free! Yes, you got that right. This WordPress Directory Plugin is absolutely free. There are no hidden costs to it. Use it risk-free to easily create an online web directory and add thousands of listings to your WordPress website.

This free directory plugin is regularly updated.

We are committed to keeping the directory plugin free of all vulnerabilities. That’s why we regularly update this Directory WordPress Plugin. These regular updates keep DT Directory Lite in tune with the changing online directory website trends and requirements.

We are here to support you!

When you use our plugins, we consider it our responsibility to offer timely support to you. All our plugins are built to deliver hassle-free performance. Still, if you run into any trouble with our free Directory Lite plugin, you can reach out to us any time. We will help you as soon as possible.

THIS BEST WORDPRESS DIRECTORY PLUGIN CAN HELP YOU TO:

  • Create advanced online directory websites, listing sites, classified ads websites, business listing sites, job portals, real estate websites, and other similar websites.
  • Create a customized homepage for your online directory business website.
  • Incorporate an advanced search system on your site.
  • Show the search output in the integrated map to give your users a geographical overview.
  • Display the search output using predefined listing templates
  • Use customized search templates and search filters.
  • Show location-based search output on maps.
  • Use Elementor or Visual Composer page builders to customize your online web directory.
  • Earn money by creating different packages for sellers and buyers.
  • Earn money by publishing ads from sellers.
  • Display reviews and ratings for listing items.
  • Create customized listing submission forms.
  • Easily upload images for listings.
  • Accept online payments using PayPal or Stripe.
  • Allow users to add and manage listings from the front-end dashboard.

THIS WORDPRESS DIRECTORY PLUGIN IS USEFUL FOR:

DT Directory Lite is a powerful Directory WordPress plugin suitable for all online directories and listing websites. You can use it to create a brand new online directory website or add powerful listing features to an existing WordPress site. It is useful for websites of:

  • Local business directories
  • Job listings
  • Classified ads websites
  • Hotel booking websites
  • Travel booking websites
  • Service directories
  • Medical directories
  • Real estate websites
  • Pets directory
  • Business directories
  • All other similar business websites.

DT DIRECTORY – WORDPRESS DIRECTORY PLUGIN FEATURES:

This free Directory WordPress Plugin is compatible with all popular SEO plugins. It offers you attractive pre-made layouts. This directory plugin is compatible with Elementor and Visual Composer page builders. So you can customize its layouts as you wish and create unique listings and item detail page templates. It is mobile-friendly and responsive when used with a responsive WordPress Theme. The top features of the DT Directory plugin include:

Easy to Use:

DT Directory Lite is built for ease of use. You can easily set up your job listings, real estate listings, automobile listings, and other business listings. You don’t need any coding knowledge to do it. This directory plugin provides you with a streamlined process to create various types of listings. You can quickly add listing details, images, agents’ contact details, and other relevant information.

Intuitive Panel for Settings:

DT Directory plugin is as easy as it is powerful. It provides you with a simple settings panel to help you customize and set up your directory listings. You can choose your Single Page templates, add a prefix for your MLS number, set the number of items to show on a page, and adjust other essential settings.

Advanced Homepage Features:

Customize your directory website’s homepage easily. Highlight listings by type, location, amenities, etc. And show featured listings prominently on your homepage.

Front-end Dashboard:

This free directory plugin provides an advanced front-end dashboard to help the users manage their profile and listings easily. Users can quickly add or delete their listings and manage other account settings. The dashboard features include My Profile, Reviews, My Listings, Add Listing, Membership, Orders, Claims, Inbox, etc. The dashboard also displays detailed statistics, including information about listings, seller status, and available packages.

Unlimited Layouts:

This online directory plugin provides you innovative layouts for listings, bookings, detail pages, etc. You can customize these layouts as you wish using the included customization options. This business directory plugin is also compatible with popular page builders such as Elementor and Visual Composer. Using these, you can design your unique listings layouts easily. You can give your directory website a personalized look using simple drag-and-drop sections. You can also add any media content to make your listing website more engaging.

Powerful Search & Sorting options with Map Output:

This free directory plugin has advanced search functionalities. The Search features include customizable Search Forms and search filters. Users can easily search for the desired item using Keyword, Location, Category, Range, Checkbox Dropdown. The plugin also supports special filters – Open Now, Nearby, Location Radius, etc. You can choose to show search results in both data and map using the predefined listing templates.

Contact Forms:

You can create and customize contact forms for your job portals, real estate listings, services booking directories, and other business listings. Make it easy for your directory website visitors to contact agents, make bookings, send inquiries, etc.

Easy to add and edit listings:

This simple directory plugin for WordPress sites makes adding the listings easy. It provides you a user-friendly form to input all the required listing details and upload images, videos, or other relevant attachments. It is also easy to assign list items to categories, contract types, and amenities. You can give a unique ID to your list items. If you want, you can also assign an in-charge person to manage your listings. If you want to edit any listing item, you can do so from My Listings.

Intuitive organization:

Set up your directory in neatly organized categories. Better organization makes your website more user-friendly and professional-looking.

Easy to add relevant data:

You can add all the essential information to your directory lists. Our business directory plugin makes it easy for you to provide information such as food menu in restaurant listings, amenity details in hotels and real estate listings, eligibility criteria in job listings, etc.

Single Page Options:

This free directory plugin provides you unlimited layout possibilities for the single pages. Use images and videos to make your item detail page more attractive. You can add various useful elements to the page. You also get advanced options to present the location details.

Packages:

You can enable directory packages. It is possible to create multiple packages based upon the features of the listed items. You can also set one-time or recurring billing options for paid packages.

Reviews & Ratings:

DT Directory plugin supports star ratings, reviews, and image uploads in reviews.

Favorite Listing:

You can allow the users of your online business directory website to favorite a listing to access it quickly later.

Inbox:

Our WordPress Directory Listing Plugin allows you to easily configure your inbox to send and accept direct messages from your clients or customers. You can choose to send the message copies to the administrators.

Ads:

Using the DT Directory plugin, you can also monetize your online business directory website by publishing ads. This best directory plugin offers you several areas to promote your business. You can display ads on the homepage, top of all the listings, top of Search, and in Detail pages.

Import/Export Listings:

With this advanced business directory plugin, you can import/export a vast amount of listing data using an XLSX file. You can import/export thousands of lists in a very short time and at no extra cost. Transferring data to a new domain or local storage is now easy and quick!

Other Options:

DT Directory WordPress plugin has many essential features for online directory and listing websites. These include Advanced Concepts such as Claims, Announcements, and Ads. It also includes powerful Admin Options for Listings, Packages, Claims, Categories, Locations, and Statistics. It is easily customizable and includes various Skins and options for permalinks, archives, social logins, etc. Other features include:

  • Front-end dashboard
  • Easy to use categories, amenities, city, neighborhood, etc. to group your listings
  • Single page layouts
  • Location configuration
  • Virtual location tour
  • Supports Filters such as Keyword, Location, Category, Range, Checkbox Dropdown. It also supports Special filters – Open now, Nearby, Location radius.
  • Customizable map listings. 3 types of listing possibilities in map
  • Number of views, average ratings, category image or icon over the map
  • Configure separately for Buyer and Seller
  • Tracking of Leads, User Views, Reviews
  • Social logins
  • Import all your listings from excel sheets
  • Detailed statistics in the admin area
  • Works with WooCommerce plugin for payments
  • Page builder both Elementor and Visual Composer compatible
  • Yelp API support for nearby places
  • Name your listings based on your business

BENEFITS:

  • Simple, easy to use, and free directory plugin
  • Best Directory WordPress plugin with flexible functionalities and advanced options
  • Compatible with Gutenberg Editor
  • Compatible with Elementor and Visual Composer page builders
  • Best WordPress Directory plugin with responsive front and back-end design
  • Advanced Search and Sorting options
  • Attractive Listing and Detail page layouts
  • User-friendly dashboard
  • Supports media uploads for listings
  • Supports unlimited list items
  • Includes useful Inbox options
  • Easy to add and edit the list items.
  • Powerful Admin Panel with detailed analytics reports
  • Supports reviews and star ratings
  • Easy to import and export thousands of listings
  • Fully compatible with classified concept sites
  • A simple directory plugin with user-friendly settings

NOTE:

SOME OF THE FEATURES AVAILABLE ONLY IN DT DIRECTORY PRO VERSION

INSTALL THE DT DIRECTORY LITE ADDON MANUALLY

  1. From the dashboard of your site, navigate to Plugins –> Add New.
  2. Select the Upload option and hit “Choose File.”
  3. When the popup appears, select the dt-directory-lite-addon.zip file from your PC.
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

Contributors & Developers:

“DT Directory Lite” is an open source software. The following people have contributed to this plugin.
Designthemes
sections.faq:
Can I use DT Directory WordPress with my existing theme?

Yes, you can use this WordPress Directory plugin with any good-quality modern theme without causing any issues.

Is this WordPress Directory plugin free?

Yes, this WordPress Directory Listing Plugin is free.

Is the DT Directory Lite plugin mobile-friendly?

Yes, this is a mobile-friendly directory plugin with a responsive front-end and back-end.

Can I use any other plugin with the DT Directory free plugin?

This free directory plugin can be used with any other plugin.

Where can I find the DT Directory plugin’s documents and user guides?

You can find extensive documentation and user guides for this directory website plugin HERE.

Where can I report a bug?

If you come across any bug, you can report it HERE

Where can I get support?

You can request support at the support section of this plugin on the WordPress plugins directory. You can also directly place your query HERE.

short_description: The DesignThemes Directory lite addon is a plugin that lets you easily manage and listings on your website.
